short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PixTube lets you quickly take clean screenshots of YouTube videos. Capture, annotate, and share key moments with ease!.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unlock the power of pristine screenshots with PixTube! This sleek Chrome extension allows you to capture crystal-clear images from any YouTube video with just a click. Whether you're a student wanting to highlight key moments for study, a content creator seeking inspiration, or simply someone who wants to share a memorable scene, Clarity Capture is your go-to tool.
